tool_description: Generates demand forecasts for products using historical sales patterns, seasonality, and trend analysis to support pricing decisions.

product_ids.description: Product IDs to generate forecasts for

historical_sales.description: Historical daily sales data for each product

forecast_horizon_days.description: Number of days to forecast ahead (1-90)

seasonality_pattern.description: Expected seasonality pattern (weekly, monthly, quarterly, none)

trend_adjustment.description: Whether to apply trend adjustment to the forecast

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: At least 30 days of sales history required for meaningful forecasting.
Invalid forecast horizon: forecast_horizon_days must be between 1 and 90.
Invalid seasonality pattern: Use one of [weekly, monthly, quarterly, none].
Invalid confidence level: confidence_level must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
Data quality issue: Historical sales data contains too many zeros or negative values for reliable forecasting.
usage: Provide product_ids and corresponding historical_sales data. Set forecast_horizon_days for the prediction window and adjust seasonality_pattern and confidence_level as needed.

product_ids.description: Product IDs for which forecasts were generated

forecasted_demand.description: Predicted daily demand for each product over the forecast horizon

demand_trend.description: Demand trend direction for each product (increasing, stable, decreasing)
